content: due to the color mix none of the squares will be exactly the same this will make each blanket different measurements approx 95 x 145 cm / 37½ x 57 materials drops delight from garnstudio 250 g color no 10 olive/rust/plum mix 50 g color no 08 green/beige mix 50 g color no 09 turquoise/purple mix 50 g color no 11 lilac/green mix **and** use drops fabel from garnstudio 200 g color no 400 black drops crochet hook size 5 mm/h/8 or size needed to get 1 square = 12 x 12 cm / 4¾ x 4¾
